sentence.Network_en: W. Somerset Maugham's novel still packs an emotional punch.
sentence.Network_cn: 威廉·萨默塞特·毛姆的小说仍具有强烈的情感冲击力。

sentence.Network_en: His dying wish was to be laid to rest at the church near his Somerset home.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的遗愿是把他安葬在家乡萨默塞特郡附近的教堂里。

sentence.Network_en: He came of Somerset gentlefolk who had lost their fortune following the American Revolution.
sentence.Network_cn: 他出身在索莫瑟的一个清白家庭里,那一家人因为追随美国革命而大倒其楣.
